languages.text: For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all of Chorda's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} automatically critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and her {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} / 2)%.{br} ! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text: На один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} все {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} атак Чорды по области автоматически считаются критическими, а {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} / 2)%.{br} ! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text: For one round, all of Chorda's area attacks automatically critically hit and her critical damage is increased by +(WP / 2)%.{br} ! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text: 库尔达所有{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}都必定会造成暴击，她的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}/2）%，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}一{/g}轮。{br} ！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text: Pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} de Chorda infligent automatiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique, et ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} augmentent de +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} / 2) %.{br} ! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text: Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erzielen alle {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} von Chorda automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} und ihr {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} erhöht sich auf +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g} / 2) %.{br} ! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

traits.locale_text: Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang landen alle {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} von Chorda automatisch{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritische Treffer{/g} und ihr {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Schaden{/g} erhöht sich auf +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g} /2) %.{br} !
